About me

I'm Hassan and I'm a

I'm a Data Scientist with more than two years of working experience. My objective is to provide my clients with excellence in service, communication and reporting. I am energetic, committed, and motivated to work and i manage deadlines with a can-do attitude. I will provide you with the quality work in affordable price My language of choice is Python, but I have experience with SQL, R, GNU Octave. I have analytical mindset with strong attention to detail and a great passion for programming. In the recent year, I started working on front end development to develop user Interfaces to visualize data with JavaScript/Vue.js.
